movie.title: Mortuary Blues
movie.description_intro: The rays of the moon bring a coven of female zombies back to life. A special police squad is assigned to stop them.
movie.description_full: The rays of the moon bring a coven of female zombies back to life. A special police squad is assigned to stop them.

movies.title: Night School
movies.summary: In 2001, high-school student Teddy Walker drops out of school when he's unable to concentrate during a crucial test. In 2018 he works as a barbecue-grill salesman and dating a wealthy woman named Lisa, and has developed a careful financial strategy that allows him to maintain the illusion that he is better off than he actually is. But his life falls apart just as he learns that he will inherit control of the store when the current manager retires: As he proposes to Lisa in the shop, he accidentally triggers an explosion when a champagne cork pops open a gas tank; the manager runs away with the insurance from the explosion. Teddy's friend is willing to give him a job--if he can earn his GED.

In 2018 he works as a barbecue-grill salesman and dating a wealthy woman named Lisa, and has developed a careful financial strategy that allows him to maintain the illusion that he is better off than he actually is. Teddy's friend is willing to give him a job--if he can earn his GED.

movies.title: Trinity Is Still My Name
movies.summary: A couple of two-bit thieving brothers try and keep a promise to their dying father: stick together and become successful outlaws. Bambino reluctantly agrees to show younger Trinity the ropes, but their gentle demeanors tend to diminish their haul by repeatedly helping the selfsame family they initially held up. Fun ensues in town and at the local Spanish mission where they are taken for federal agents, mistakenly so identified by Trinity's young love interest, daughter of the aforementioned family.

movies.title: Lucky 13
movies.summary: A man revisits the previous significant girlfriends in his life in order to win over the girl of his dreams.
movies.description_full: A man revisits the previous significant girlfriends in his life in order to win over the girl of his dreams.
movies.synopsis: A man revisits the previous significant girlfriends in his life in order to win over the girl of his dreams.

movies.title: The Way of the Dragon
movies.summary: Tang Lung arrives in Rome to help his cousins in the restaurant business. They are being pressured to sell their property to the syndicate, who will stop at nothing to get what they want. When Tang arrives he poses a new threat to the syndicate, and they are unable to defeat him. The syndicate boss hires the best Japanese and European martial artists to fight Tang, but he easily finishes them off. The American martial artist Colt is hired and has a showdown with Tang in Rome's famous Colosseum.
